author: COMSOL
description: This example illustrates the modeling of a three cylinder reciprocating engine. In the first part of the model, variation in the cylinder pressure as a function of crankshaft rotation is computed using thermodynamic analysis. In the second part of the model, flexible multibody dynamic analysis is performed using the previously generated pressure data to obtain the RPM of the crankshaft, power output of the engine and stresses in the flexible connecting rod. All the components in the engine are assumed rigid except one connecting rod. The connections between different components are modeled using prismatic and hinge joints.
label: reciprocating_engine.mph
name: root
